name: Stray Thoughts of God
description:
STRAY THOUGHTS OF GOD

These are three places one can get to in an extradimensional dungeon, which lives in the absentminded imaginings of an uncaring God. Demons, Angels, and Fluids abound, as do apartments, parties, strife, and sunglasses stores. Doors - with a capital D - allow one to warp to new areas. Regular doors still act like regular doors.

Statsless, system-neutral, ready for a fever dream or near death experience or ongoing jaunt in reality's attic.

This dungeon exists because of Amen Break. That RPG posits dungeon rooms connected by doors that act more like portals, and the PCs crawl through these 'Twisters', trying to destroy them and arrive at the seat of the Demiurge, POINT SAINT NEMO. Amen Break is awesome and has a lot of random tables for making Twisters and PCs and NPCs.

More rooms are coming. Unless life and that uncaring God have other ideas.

How to Fold a Pocketmod - the rooms are a pocketmod and include a screen-friendly pdf as well. 

Art is collages I made from public domain images from oldbookillustrations.com
